--- title: Interface keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar nb_path: "nbs\11_interface.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Functions

The implemented functions are as follows:

  • Create database
  • Import raw data
  • Perform feature finding
  • Search data with fasta
  • Recalibrate
  • Score data with fasta
  • Perform LFQ
  • Export results
  • Run whole workflow

The last command allows to run the whole pipeline at once.

Helper functions include:

  • Callback function to track progress
  • Logging function
  • Version/hardware/settings checks
